Package bonzai.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AI
    AIs will implement this interface in order to define their decision making process.
    Duck
    Ducks are the objective of the game.
    Entity
    An entity is a game object which can be interacted with in the world.
    Farmhand
    Farmhands are your eyes and ears on the battlefield.
    FarmhandAction
    A general interface for farmhand actions.
    FarmhandActionResult
    The result of an action what was previously taken.
    GameState
    The full state of the game on a specific turn.
    Item
    Items are entities which farmhands may pickup, carry, and set down.
    OwnedEntity
    An OwnedEntity is an Entity which is owned by a team.
    Tile
    Tiles are the building block of the map.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Position
    An immutable object for representing a position on the board
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Duck.Mood
    The three states representing a Duck's level of excitement, or mood.
    FarmhandAction.ActionType
    The various types of actions which a farmhand may take.
    Item.Type
    An enum representing the tool type.
    Position.Direction
    A representation of orthogonal and diagonal directions and their associated x and y offsets.
    Tile.State
    The possible terrain types for a tile.
